name.baseName: Fried dried fruits ; Peanuts, broad beans, orchid beans, etc. ; Pickling + frying ; All sizes; NESPS2
炸干果 ; 花生、蚕豆、兰花豆等 ; 泡制+油炸 ; 所有规模 ; 全国第二次污染普查数据

dataSetInformation.common:generalComment: the Technical of end-of-pipe management technology for pollution Exhaust gasis/，The formula for calculating the actual operation rate (k-value) of the end-of-pipe treatment facility is k = power consumption of treatment facilities (kWh/year) / (equipment rated power (kW) × equipment operating time (hours/year))

technology.technologyDescriptionAndIncludedProcesse: the Technical of end-of-pipe management technology for pollution Exhaust gasis/，The formula for calculating the actual operation rate (k-value) of the end-of-pipe treatment facility is k = power consumption of treatment facilities (kWh/year) / (equipment rated power (kW) × equipment operating time (hours/year))
technology.technologicalApplicability: 所描述的工业过程涉及生产和处理炸干果（如花生、蚕豆和兰花豆），包含了泡制和油炸操作，适用于各种规模的生产。过程数据还包括用于处理污染如氨氮、化学需氧量、有机结合氮、总磷、颗粒物（PM2.5 - PM10）和挥发性有机化合物的各种末端治理技术。这些技术包括厌氧和好氧生物处理、化学混凝、沉淀分离、静电沉降、光催化、光解和布袋过滤。

referenceToDataSource.common:shortDescription: 第二次全国污染源普查产排污核算系数手册（试用版）,四级代码1372文件，在完整版文件中第2644页

dataSourcesTreatmentAndRepresentativenes.useAdviceForDataSet: This dataset is derived from the Pollution Source Census Report and contains information on pollution emissions and related products. However, it does not include data on energy or chemical consumption, nor does it provide information on waste or co-product generation. When utilizing this dataset, please supplement the missing data based on actual conditions before use
该数据集来源于污染源普查报告，包含污染物排放及相关产品信息，但不包含能源或化学品消耗数据，也不提供废弃物或共生产物产生信息。在使用该数据集时，请根据实际情况补充缺失数据后再使用。

review.common:reviewDetails: Inventory: The internal review was done by several iteration steps concerning raw data validation, raw data documentation, representativity, completeness and consistency of modelling with regard to ISO 14040 and 14044.
清单： 内部审查通过几个迭代步骤完成，涉及原始数据验证、原始数据记录、代表性、完整性、与 ISO 14040 和 14044 有关的建模的一致性。

common:referenceToPersonOrEntityGenerati.common:shortDescription: The data was created by the Office of the Second National Pollution Source Census of the Ministry of Ecology and Environment, and the data was organized by the TianGong Plan team for ILCD format
生态环境部第二次全国污染源普查工作办公室创建数据，天工计划团队常慧敏整理数据为ILCD格式

publicationAndOwnership.common:licenseType: Free of charge for all users and uses

exchange.generalComment: nan
源文件中描述为为炸干果，此处对其进行了匹配工作，将其匹配到LCAflow库里面相最符合的流

the Technical of end-of-pipe management technology for pollution Ammonia NitrogenisAnaerobic biological treatment + aerobic biological treatment，Its Technical efficiency of end-of-pipe management85，The formula for calculating the actual operation rate (k-value) of the end-of-pipe treatment facility is /
污染物指标氨氮的末端治理技术是厌氧生物+好氧生物处理法，其效率为85，末端治理设施实际运行率（k值）计算公式为k=污水治理设施运行时间（天/年）/生产时间（天/年）。原文件中描述污染物类别为废水，污染物指标为氨氮，此处对其进行了匹配工作，将其匹配到LCAflow库里面相最符合的流

the Technical of end-of-pipe management technology for pollution Ammonia NitrogenisAerobic biological treatment，Its Technical efficiency of end-of-pipe management70，The formula for calculating the actual operation rate (k-value) of the end-of-pipe treatment facility is k = operating time of denitration facility (hours/year) / production device production time (hours/year)
污染物指标氨氮的末端治理技术是好氧生物处理法，其效率为70，末端治理设施实际运行率（k值）计算公式为k=污水治理设施运行时间（天/年）/生产时间（天/年）。原文件中描述污染物类别为废水，污染物指标为氨氮，此处对其进行了匹配工作，将其匹配到LCAflow库里面相最符合的流

污染物指标总氮的末端治理技术是厌氧生物+好氧生物处理法，其效率为70，末端治理设施实际运行率（k值）计算公式为k=污水治理设施运行时间（天/年）/生产时间（天/年）。原文件中描述污染物类别为废水，污染物指标为总氮，此处对其进行了匹配工作，将其匹配到LCAflow库里面相最符合的流

the Technical of end-of-pipe management technology for pollution Ammonia NitrogenisChemical coagulation，Its Technical efficiency of end-of-pipe management20，The formula for calculating the actual operation rate (k-value) of the end-of-pipe treatment facility is k = operating time of desulfurization facility (hour/year) / production device production time (hour/year)
污染物指标氨氮的末端治理技术是化学混凝法，其效率为20，末端治理设施实际运行率（k值）计算公式为k=污水治理设施运行时间（天/年）/生产时间（天/年）。原文件中描述污染物类别为废水，污染物指标为氨氮，此处对其进行了匹配工作，将其匹配到LCAflow库里面相最符合的流
the Technical of end-of-pipe management technology for pollution Ammonia NitrogenisPrecipitation separation，Its Technical efficiency of end-of-pipe management10
污染物指标氨氮的末端治理技术是沉淀分离，其效率为10，末端治理设施实际运行率（k值）计算公式为k=1。原文件中描述污染物类别为废水，污染物指标为氨氮，此处对其进行了匹配工作，将其匹配到LCAflow库里面相最符合的流
